course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Mathematical Theory of Wave Propagation in Complex Media
course.description: This course aims to introduce basic mathematical theory and tools for the study of wave propagation and scattering in complex media. It will cover topics such as stochastic differential equation, random layer media, time reversal and imaging. Students would seek instructorâ€™s approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2350 AND MATH 2023 AND MATH 2421
